long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Follower Analysis for Instagram

See follower analytics of any Instagram account for free. It is the easiest way to do your follower analysis safely.

How it works: Log in to your account on the Instagram official site in the browser. Then search for any username via the extension. From the results, select the user you want to analyze for followers and view the analysis.

REMEMBER, the profile on which you will analyze followers should not be private.

Download and try now.

If you have a feature request in mind or have found a bug you would like to report, please let us know by contacting us via email.
